TextFlow.p: This film is a classic tale of a boy becoming a man.

p.span: three friends and their struggle against evil…

TextFlow.p: Unfortunately, I found this story rather unconvincing.
The writer does an excellent job of describing characters.
I was impressed by the writer’s imagination.
One aspect that I found a little disappointing was the battle scenes.
One possible problem is that the film seems rushed at times.
I would highly recommend this satisfying film.
By the end of the film, you feel that the story is complete.
I was left disappointed by this story.
I would strongly advise against this film for young children.
